3981-1%1.1.2.3%Bignoniaceae%%N%Adenocalymma%%N%%%gen.%Mart. ex Meisn.%%Mart. ex Meisn.%Adenocalymma%Pl. Vasc. Gen. [Meisner]%1: 300; 2: 208%1840%%as "Adenocalymna"; Endlicher (Enchir. Bot. 347. 1841) used "Adenocalymma Mart." Later
column2: Meisner (l.c. 2: 374. 2-4 Nov 1843) also used "Adenocalymma." V. V. Scudeller's (see Taxon 49: 303-304. 2000) proposal to accept the spelling "Adenocalymma" was recommended by the  Committee for Spermatophyta (see Taxon 50: 1181-1182. 2001). The General Committee approved the correction (as reported at the July 2005 Botanical Congress in Vienna).%%%%%tax. nov.
